x=input()
for i in range(x):
    n=input()
    if(n==1 or n==2 or n==3 or n==5 or n==6):
        print -1
        continue
    if n==4:
        print 0
        continue
    if n%7==0:
        print n
        continue
    t=0
    p=0
    while(1):
        t+=4
        p=n-t
        if(p%7==0):
            print p
            break
        if p<0:
            print -1
            break
    else:
        print 0
